tool_description: An API to rapidly retrieve information about drug prices and history across a variety of sources
title: Drug Info and Price History

api_list.name: Drug Info
api_list.description: Returns information about the given drug

utterances.utterance: What is the price history of Advil?
Can you provide information about Tylenol?
Tell me about the price trends of Ibuprofen.
What are the latest prices for Aspirin?
Give me details about the cost history of Benadryl.
Can you retrieve information about Allegra?
What is the price history of Claritin?
Tell me about the price trends of Zyrtec.
What are the latest prices for Motrin?
Give me details about the cost history of NyQuil.

api_list.name: genericname
api_list.description: Given a brand name, returns a generic name

utterances.utterance: What is the generic name for Advil?
Can you tell me the generic name of Tylenol?
Find the generic name for the drug Motrin.
What is the generic equivalent of Aleve?
Could you provide the generic name for Benadryl?
I need the generic name for Claritin.
What is the generic name for Zyrtec?
Please find the generic name for Allegra.
Can you tell me the generic name for Prilosec?
What is the generic name for Nexium?

api_list.name: Price History
api_list.description: Returns an array of price histories when given a valid drug ID.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://drug-info-and-price-history.p.rapidapi.com/1/history"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "drug-info-and-price-history.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

utterances.utterance: Can you provide the price history for drug ID 12345?
What is the historical pricing data for drug ID 67890?
Retrieve the price history for drug ID 54321.
Show me the price trends for drug ID 98765.
Get the price history for drug ID 11223.
What are the past prices for drug ID 33445?
Provide the historical price data for drug ID 55667.

What does the price history look like for drug ID 99001?
Retrieve the historical pricing information for drug ID 22334.
